page.title: 04TATTON GARDENS
page.content: THESE ARE UNIQUE FOR THEIR SIZE,60 ACRES,{VARIETY AND RANGE OF STYLES, PROVIDING INTEREST THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.HERBACEOUS BORDERS,TERRACES, LAWNS AND FOUNTAINS ARE INTERSPERSED WITH FINE SPECIMEN TREES, SHRUBBERIES AND WINDING PATHWAYS AN ITALIAN STYLE GARDEN WITH FLOWER BEDS ROUND A POOL WAS CREATED IN THE MID I9 CENTURY;EVEN EARLIER IS THE PINETUM, A COLLECTION OF MATURE CONIFERS UNDERPLANTED WITH BLUEBELLS. IN SPRING THERE ARE MAGNOLIAS, AZALEAS AND RHODODENDRONS, MANY UNIQUE TO TATTON; AN ORANGERY AND A FERNERY WITH A COLLECTION OF N.Z. TREE FERNS BROUGHT BACK BY CAPT. CHARLES EGERTON IN I83O. THE 3RD BARON EGERTON BROUGHT WORKERS OVER FROM JAPAN TO CREATE THE JAPANESE GARDENS WITH A SHINTO TEMPLE.ON THE GOLDEN BROOK MANY WATER FOWL ENLIVEN THE SCENE.
